fields.name: Abduct (x2):
fields.value: Target any player that you shared an HN chat with for the prior evening. Visits to them will secretly fail.

fields.name: Persuasion (1x, 120%):
fields.value: Upon use, any player who shared an HN chat with you in the last evening will get feedback as if they had used a random ability from a random investigative role, regardless of their used ability and target.

fields.name: Recondition (0x, 200%):
fields.value: Target a player youâ€™ve used abduct on. Their role will appear to be its unseen counterpart if flipped upon death. If no unseen counterpart exists, it will appear as Assassin (259).
